actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1595.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 12161 to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations to the United States Railway Association for purposes of purchasing securities of the Consolidated Rail Corporation.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 12161 (United States Railway Association Appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 12161 to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations to the United States Railway Association for purposes of purchasing securities of the Consolidated Rail Corporation.
